passives.name: Guiding Light
passives.effects: Upon casting your [[champion ability|ultimate]], you ''Transcend'' for 9 seconds. While ''Transcended'', increase your {{as|'''maximum''' health by {{fd|12.5}}%}} and cause you and all allies within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1200 units to {{tip|heal}} for {{as|{{fd|3}}% of your '''maximum''' health}} upon you ''Transcending'' and every 3 seconds thereafter, for a total healing of {{as|{{ap|3*4}}% of your '''maximum''' health}}.

effects_structured.raw: Upon casting your [[champion ability ultimate]], you ''Transcend'' for 9 seconds

While ''Transcended'', increase your {{as '''maximum''' health by {{fd 12.5}}%}} and cause you and all allies within {{tip cr icononly=true}} 1200 units to {{tip heal}} for {{as {{fd 3}}% of your '''maximum''' health}} upon you ''Transcending'' and every 3 seconds thereafter, for a total healing of {{as {{ap 3*4}}% of your '''maximum''' health}}.
